data.message: is it possible to block every thing my friends like, shares, their updates etc? i dont want to see it. i dont care about a friend of mine befriending someone i dont know. why would i care about that? i dont know that person.

replies.message: Hi Magnus. We recommend unfollowing them if you no longer want to receive updates, but you don't want to remove them as a friend. https://www.facebook.com/help/104941232944896 -Zack

Facebook We want to receive their posts but NOT the likes, Zach.  I like knowing what my friends are talking about, but my timeline gets clusterbombed by the likes people put out.  I really don't care what they are liking.  Let us opt out of serendipity please.

Facebook Please help me fb there is a problem to verify my page.it show this msg..
Mentions Verification Request
Unfortunately, we're unable to process your Mentions request right now.

why is it of my concern who my friends befriend? if someone in real life gets a new friend should he notify me of it? maybe call me and say "hey man, i just got a new friend at work, just letting you know!!" ?
